name: Ali'N Co.
description:
INTRODUCTION

Play as an unreliable space delivery crew, organizing a dubious cargo.

Increase your profit by collecting and sorting packages, make passes to have more valuable packages, and do all of that while trying to control yourself in 0 gravity.

But beware of the space krakens, or don't get sucked into the vacuum of space…

CONTROL

Direction : left Joystick  

Bump : "B" button

Grab/Drop : "RT"/"X" button

TEAM

This game was made for our 3rd year at IIM digital school, we are a group of 12 people.

Game designer : 

Hugo Costard, Mathis Pham, Nino Barbier

Game Producer : 

William Lavergne

Game Art : 

Deirdre Aragnou, Léopold Walho

Game programmer : 

Matthieu Cogez, Maxence Dupin, Morigan Letourneau, Kevin Vu-Morello

Sound Designer : 

Julien Pawlowski, Valentin Chevrier

This game was made during our third year in IIM Digital school, the objective was to create a game that would host four players at the same time, a "Couch Game".
